column5: Sweet Geezus! HB is like a speedbump on the road in front of Lowrance!

Humminbird just released a 15" units a few weeks before this 16" Lowrance was released? I don't see how hummingbird needs to "move over" over a 1" bigger screen LOL.  Either way, this is definitely getting ridiculous. I watched Edwin Evers standing beside the 16 carbon for an hour yesterday online and that fishfinder looks massive. he also did a video on it and said it was like having 4 seven inch units lol. So if you are one to run multiple units on the bow or at the helm, I guess it could be cheaper...

"Move over Hummingbird" ! LMAO... yah, like there's even the need to signal the lane change!    Both good brands. This thing looks to be a beast. Not far off here from a new rig and come time will be looking more closely at sonar options.  Does one need all the bells and whistles to fish, absolutely not. Do more bells and whistles help you to fish a better? Absolutely they can.  A standard GPS/Sonar combo should be must for anyone. Past couple years too, side imaging has been a good tool to have for some things too.  Last I looked, (and I didn't look closely) there was no unit that could combine all four-in-one.  If wanting these features, you're into two units.  Now... what's that cost comparison?  Will have to look.
Nuff Said . . .
Dave beat you to it.
Dave beat you to it. He's a son of a . . . . LOL . . .
i guess many of us get the emails from them
He's a son of a . . . . LOL . . .
Thats ridiculous. Do people actually buy these things??  S.
Come on man, of course you need the latest and greatest for your glitter boat!
It would look way out of place in My scratched up, dented, dirty old boat.
For the price of two of these I can buy a boat lol  Lowrance, if your reading this, I need a full sponsorship.
Think of it as a minnow bucket you can plug in.
Then it's even more overpriced haha

Come on man, of course you need the latest and greatest for your glitter boat! ALL the youngsters definitive need to get at least 2 of these units..... and I will tell you WHY......first and foremost  most can't fish without them . . . .second  . . . . they will look uncool without them . . . . . . . Dumbbutts . . . .  However, here's the real reason . . . . . . .  now us old guys can upgrade to the next level of electronics on our boats at 35% what  you paid for the same crap we will be purchasing for our boats . . . . and you know what . . . . . .neither of us will catch anymore fish then the year before . . . . .

LMAO @ ALL YAS, Well except me bye S.  I want to see depth,fish. In that order.  Keep it simple stupid.   Terry, you have enough crap already. Oh and that crap works. Maybe too much crap, but ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
"Move over Hummingbird" ! LMAO... yah, like there's even the need to signal the lane change!
yeah, i think i can do without one of them. i havent even used my echoMAP™ CHIRP 75sv, yet

lol. if someone wants to buy me one, l would surely use it its my wallet falling behind not my want of new toys
